name: sindex-website
description: Sinister Dexter band website with image processing

scripts.build:images: npm run convert-heic && npm run process-images
scripts.build: npm run build:images && npm run build:members && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run sitemap
scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run test && npm run test:resources
scripts.build:force: npm run convert-heic && npm run process-images:force && npm run build:css && npm run build:html
scripts.serve: cd public && python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.clean: rm -rf public/images/* public/index.html public/styles.css public/sitemap.xml public/sitemap.txt .image-cache.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.preview: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && wrangler dev
